name: Add new SmartSuite records to Google Sheets as rows
description: Streamline your project management workflow by automatically logging new records from SmartSuite into Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new record is created in SmartSuite, Make will instantly add a corresponding row in your Google Sheets, ensuring that your data is organized and easily accessible for analysis and reporting. This integration helps you maintain an up-to-date overview of your projects, enhancing collaboration and efficiency within your team.
